about.summary: Estimation of time-dependent ROC curve and area under time dependent ROC curve (AUC) in the presence of censored data, with or without competing risks. Confidence intervals of AUCs and tests for comparing AUCs of two rival markers measured on the same subjects can be computed, using the iid-representation of the AUC estimator. Plot functions for time-dependent ROC curves and AUC curves are provided. Time-dependent Positive Predictive Values (PPV) and Negative Predictive Values (NPV) can also be computed.

Estimation of time-dependent ROC curve and area under time dependent ROC curve (AUC) in the presence of censored data, with or without competing risks. Confidence intervals of AUCs and tests for comparing AUCs of two rival markers measured on the same subjects can be computed, using the iid-representation of the AUC estimator. Plot functions for time-dependent ROC curves and AUC curves are provided. Time-dependent Positive Predictive Values (PPV) and Negative Predictive Values (NPV) can also be computed.

name: r-timeroc
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-timeroc
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: timeROC_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/timeROC_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/timeROC/timeROC_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 618f105e0e6e463520845e2f70d3cd8b8d2b5e244508c95d5c887d05cf93b1e3

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 3
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mvtnorm >=1.0_1
    - r-pec >=2.4.4
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mvtnorm >=1.0_1
    - r-pec >=2.4.4

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('timeROC')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('timeROC')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=timeROC
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Estimation of time-dependent ROC curve and area under time dependent ROC curve (AUC)
    in the presence of censored data, with or without competing risks. Confidence intervals
    of AUCs and tests for comparing AUCs of two rival markers measured on the same subjects
    can be computed, using the iid-representation of the AUC estimator. Plot functions
    for time-dependent ROC curves and AUC curves are provided. Time-dependent Positive
    Predictive Values (PPV) and Negative Predictive Values (NPV) can also be computed.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
